version_description: updated chart screen

We've heard your feedback! Here's what we've done:
- More then quadrupled the amount of valuable content.
- Added over 60 videos explaining in-depth what these leaps are all about
- added the ability to take notes
- a complete new, fresh design

- Detailed Read InApp chapters descriptions
- Read InApp - ajust font size (iPhones only)
- Read InApp chapter opens at last viewed page
- New tables selection styles
- Other app improvements and fixed bugs

We heard you:
- We've simplified the design.
- We've added content and streamlined the flow.
- We've added the 'XX days until change' label again!

We heard you:
- We've simplified the design.
- We've added content and streamlined the flow.
- We've added the 'XX days until change' label again!

Thanks for all the good feedback: Here's what's new:
- The profile image slides up to make reading a lot easier
- The popular XX days until the end of this leap is back!

Have fun with this new version!

We have added Calendar syncing feature. Now your child's leap reminders will appear on Google Calendar as well.

We have added Calendar syncing feature. Now your child's leap reminders will appear on Google Calendar as well.

-Bugfixes

Thank you for all your lovely feedback and tips for improvement. Here's what we have improved;
- Enhanced the overall look and feel to make navigation more intuitive
- Improved notifications and reminders to give you a timely 'heads-up'.
- we've done a complete review of the content and expanded on it.

- New colors and style for Chart screen
- Leap numbers for All Leaps screen
- Other improvements

- New colors and style for Chart screen
- Leap numbers for All Leaps screen
- Other improvements
- Bugfixes

Welcome to The Wonder Weeks 7.2. release!

In order to make The Wonder Weeks app even better for all our users, we have implemented some new features that YOU asked for!
Take a look below to see what's new in your favourite baby app!

* Share Notes feature for your baby's progress: Now you can share all your baby Notes with your family and friends, or even send the Notes to yourself and re-read them later!
* Tell a Friend feature: The quickest way to recommend The Wonder Weeks smartphone and tablet app to all your new-parents Friends!
* Privacy Policy updated in compliance to the GDPR

Welcome to The Wonder Weeks 7.2. release!
In order to make The Wonder Weeks app even better for all our users, we have implemented some new features that YOU asked for!
Take a look below to see what's new in your favourite baby app!

* Share Notes feature for your baby's progress: Now you can share all your baby Notes with your family and friends, or even send the Notes to yourself and re-read them later!
* Tell a Friend feature: The quickest way to recommend The Wonder Weeks smartphone and tablet app to all your new-parents Friends!
* Privacy Policy updated in compliance to the GDPR
* Bug fixes and other improvements

- Improved video player
- fixed bugs
- fixed a bug where some users could not hear audio

Improved iOS 12 support
Bugfix in the purchase restore occurring to some users
Bugfix for restore purchases
- minor improvements

- eBook & Audiobook
- 400+ milestones: track & create a diary
- 200+ activities to stimulate development
- HD baby monitor - 4G/WiFi
- White Noise & Sleep Music
- Baby Sleep track system
- Anchor moments to keep the stress at bay.

Our app went through a leap!
We listened to our users and completely rebuild the app: a fresh new design, improved the navigation and rewritten many texts.
We hope you will enjoy our new app!
